welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chhatapur, India! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's rich history, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that Chhatapur has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rajbiraj Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biratnagar Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Biratnagar Airport is responsible for handling all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the 'BIR Airport WiFi' network and entering the provided password.
